title: Angela: Queen of Hel #1
description: HEL HATH A NEW FURY.Stolen from ASGARD, exiled from HEVEN, and robbed of SERA, her greatest companion â€“ ANGELA plunges into the depths of blackest HEL to save her friend...and once there, the lost princess of Asgard will carve out a realm of her very own. All hail ANGELA, THE NEW QUEEN OF HEL!
author: Marguerite Bennett
